p: In the LRGV, 580 pools representing 5,215 individual Ae. aegypti mosquitoes were collected from AGO traps. Specifically, 205 pools (2,161 Ae. aegypti females) were captured from March to December 2017, and 375 pools (3,054 Ae. aegypti females) were collected from January to December 2018 (Table 1). The IR (per 1,000 individuals) per month ranged from 7.3 in October to 95.7 in March for 2017 and from 0 in February to 158.1 in December for 2018 (Fig. 2). CFAV infection was consistent throughout the months of sampling with no clear evidence of seasonal structure. A non-significant difference was observed in monthly IR between 2017 and 2018 ( p > 0.05).
